author: Oorwin

content_security_policy.sandbox: sandbox allow-scripts; script-src 'self' https://api.beanhiredev.us https://api.beanhiredev.com https://api.oorwinlabs.com; object-src 'self'; connect-src 'self' https://api.oorwin.com https://api.oorwin.us https://api.beanhiredev.com https://api.beanhiredev.us https://api.oorwinlabs.com; style-src 'self' 'unsafe-inline' 'unsafe-eval' 'strict-dynamic'; img-src 'self'  data:; frame-src 'self' https://api.beanhiredev.com https://api.oorwinlabs.com https://api.oorwin.com ;

description: The Oorwin Quick Parser Plugin enables you to parse candidates from any location using your Chrome browser.
name: Oorwin - Quick Parser
